channel.title: Sumthin nice, gl to all survival servers
channel.description:
It isn't completed, just a framework for what I plan to do.
There's a lot more after this, but you'll have to play the alpha/beta to see it :) It's so much better in game. The screen shakes and stuff but for some reason it doesn't show on hypercam.
watch in hd
[youtube]http://youtu.be/0Q__9aBMBvY[/youtube]
[youtube]http://youtu.be/knzNYTtPca8[/youtube]

item.title: Sumthin nice, gl to all survival servers
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:10, topic:488557”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=606789.msg4228057#msg4228057 date=1361107300]
It is an explosion meant to kill them, but they survive and eventually escape. The player is teleported away in the mean time.
[/quote]
Oh god… The typical “You were supposed to die… Now die again” Shit…
Use lighting, fire, or an elemental spell of some sort.[/quote]
Yeah, john and I don’t want to say too much, we don’t wanna spoil the story. But yes, that’s what happens

@asshole_rule: tybg will look into that

EDIT: beefing this up more, adding more things then I’ll make another video!

Read full topic

item.title: Sumthin nice, gl to all survival servers
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Clawz fury, post:6, topic:488557”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=606789.msg4228009#msg4228009 date=1361102686]

thanks for criticism, gonna keep improving on it tomorrow.

keep it coming!

Teach me how you did the cutscene

And nice, hypercam did show the shaking, idk if there was other stuff… But I really don’t like that explosion gfx.
[/quote]
lots of events… LOTS and a few packets

what do you guys suggest I use at the end rather then that explosion?[/quote]
Well… Does the spell actually kill them, or is it just an event that comes later in the server?

Read full topic
